game.name: Thirteen Kitty
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A battle of cute cats! Prove you are the strongest feline to become the 13th Zodiac animal. Harness the powers of the Zodiacs as you fight to reach the top. Experience the casual 1-on-1 multiplayer action of "Thirty Kitty".
game.shortDescriptionEn: A battle of cute cats! Prove you are the strongest feline to become the 13th Zodiac animal. Harness the powers of the Zodiacs as you fight to reach the top. Experience the casual 1-on-1 multiplayer action of "Thirty Kitty".
